name: Amazona Account Verification
description: Account security review with urgent verification button.
subject_line: Action Required: Verify Your Amazona Account
html:
Hi,

We detected a new sign-in attempt and need you to verify your account to avoid temporary suspension.

Verify Account

Verification required within 24 hours.

Thank you,
Amazona Security Team

name: DocuShare Secure Document
description: Shared document requires sign-in to view.
subject_line: New Secure Document: Q1 Compensation Review
html:
Hello,

A secure document was shared with you. Please sign in to view it.

View Secure Document

This link expires in 2 hours.

DocuShare Team

name: PayWave Invoice Attachment
description: Invoice payment notice with attachment download.
html:
Dear Customer,

Your invoice is overdue. Please download the attached statement to avoid late fees.

Download Invoice

If you already paid, disregard this notice.

PayWave Billing

name: IT Password Expiration
description: Internal IT notice requiring immediate password update.
html:
Hi Team Member,

Your corporate password expires today. Update now to avoid account lockout.

Update Password

Regards,
IT Service Desk

name: HR Policy Acknowledgement
description: Internal HR policy update requiring acknowledgement.
subject_line: Immediate Action: New Remote Work Policy
html:
Hello,

We updated the remote work policy. Please acknowledge by end of day.

Review Policy

HR Compliance Team
